recordCreates.description: Store everything captured in the clinical assessment
recordCreates.name: ClinicalAssessment
recordCreates.label: Clinical Assessment

fields.name: QuestionaireCallScript
fields.fieldText: Now, I’d like to ask you questions about your symptoms and medical history.

fields.name: CurrentSymptomsHeading
fields.fieldText: Current Symptoms {!ClinicalAssessmentFor}

fields.name: CoughQ
fields.fieldText: Cough (New Onset or Worsening of Chronic Cough)

screens.name: Collect_Test_and_Hospitalization_Status_Provider_and_PCP_information
screens.label: Collect Test and Hospitalization Status, Provider and PCP information

fields.name: CallScript
fields.fieldText: Please verify your testing and hospitalization status and provide us with your primary care physician's name

fields.name: MedicalHistoryCallScript
fields.fieldText: Has the individual been diagnosed with any of the following conditions?

fields.name: MedicalHistory
fields.fieldText: Medical History {!ClinicalAssessmentFor}

textTemplates.name: AsymptomaticResult
textTemplates.text:
Assessment Results: {!PatientStatus}


{!IndividualName} may be infected or have a risk for infection. Ensure that {!IndividualName} remains in isolation, stays away from public places, and refrains from having visitors.

textTemplates.name: ClinicalAssessmentFor
textTemplates.text: for {!IndividualName}

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessage_DOB
textTemplates.text: Enter a valid date of birth

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessage_Email
textTemplates.text: Enter a valid email address.

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessage_Phone
textTemplates.text: Enter a valid phone number.

textTemplates.name: NoRiskResult
textTemplates.text:
Assessment Results: {!PatientStatus}


{!IndividualName} doesn't require testing. Based on {!IndividualName}'s responses, there's no evidence of symptoms of infection. {!IndividualName} can stay healthy by practicing social distancing to reduce community transmission and should follow guidelines from local officials.

textTemplates.name: SymptomaticResult
textTemplates.text:
Assessment Results: {!PatientStatus}


{!IndividualName} has symptoms of infection. We'll be in contact regarding self-care steps. Ensure that {!IndividualName} remains in isolation, stays away from public places, and refrains from having visitors.
